summary: This bill, H.R. 1461, proposes to designate the United States Postal Service facility located at 521 Thorn Street in Sewickley, Pennsylvania, as the "Mary Elizabeth Bettie Cole Post Office Building." The bill outlines the official designation and specifies that any existing references to the facility should be updated to reflect the new name. The bill was introduced in the House of Representatives on February 21, 2025.
